channel.title: Member status
channel.description:
Ok so for my server, regescape, i made a option where you start of as a normal player or by paying 5 dollers or by doing some insane stuff on the server, you get member which allows you to wield certain items and gives you access to certain shops. everything works except that when someone joins, they automatically become member. any help?
will ++rep
